prompt: A cat in a space suit floating in a giant bowl of cereal.

A polar bear wearing a Hawaiian shirt and sunglasses, climbing on a floating hourglass in a swimming pool.

A caveman trying to fix a giant, glowing hologram computer with a wooden club.

A robot and a mannequin having a romantic candlelit dinner, but they are eating nuts and bolts.

A giant crab playing a grand piano on a beach, but the piano keys are made of corn on the cob.
An alien and an astronaut sharing a giant watermelon on the moon while Earth explodes in the background (as a firework).
